anathema: Destroy lotus fields, interfere with the flow of the Matra river, pollute clean water, reveal the location of non-evil fugitives
edict: Aid the persecuted, accommodate and facilitate others, practice contemplation and restraint
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Matravash (The Wide Water)](/Deities.aspx?ID=617)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 322

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Aid the persecuted, accommodate and facilitate others, practice contemplation and restraint

**Anathema** Destroy lotus fields, interfere with the flow of the Matra river, pollute clean water, reveal the location of non-evil fugitives

**Area of Concern**
Matra River

**Pantheons**
[Guardians Of The Sacred Self](/Deities.aspx?ID=379)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49)

**Favored Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=404)

**Domains** [Cities](/Domains.aspx?ID=66), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=93), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=98)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Share Lore](/Spells.aspx?ID=2363)

- **3rd**
[Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=1677)

- **4th**
[Hydraulic Torrent](/Spells.aspx?ID=1562)

</column>
name: Matravash (The Wide Water)
religious_symbol: Lotus blossom floating on a winding river
